A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing\, a lot of characters established in the last movies are completely ruined (especially Luke and Finn). Only Adam Driver's character is well developed. The script has a lot of incoherences when it comes to the purpose of Luke\, some subplots are completely worthless and useless to the story (the casino planet with Rose and Finn is boring as hell). However\, the movie has great visuals\, it's a decent movie but a terrible Star Wars.
